item.description: âš ï¸âœ´ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis has declared that she will not run for re-election in 2026. Lummis played a pivotal role in advancing the U.S. national Bitcoin reserve bill. For further details, check out this article.

item.title: ğŸ—“ Key events planned for December 22, 2025, feature China's LPR announcement at 04:15 MSK, the UK's ...
item.description: ğŸ—“ Key events planned for December 22, 2025, feature China's LPR announcement at 04:15 MSK, the UK's Q3 GDP release at 10:00 MSK, and the Chicago Fed National Activity Index in the US at 16:30 MSK. The US PCE Price Index is expected to be released at 18:00 MSK, although this timing is tentative. Additionally, Trump will hold a conversation with Hegset, accompanied by Rubio, at 00:30 MSK. Furthermore, DOM.RF shares will commence trading on the Moscow Exchange.

item.description: ğŸŒ Global inflows into equity ETFs have soared to nearly $1.4 trillion this year, marking a new record. item.title: ğŸŒ¾ Russian grain continues to be a highly coveted commodity worldwide. In the 2023/2024 agricultural ...
item.description: ğŸŒ¾ Russian grain continues to be a highly coveted commodity worldwide. In the 2023/2024 agricultural season, record amounts surpassing 70 million tons were exported to international partners. Although global prices are currently lower, which has affected export volumes, there has been a stabilization in trends since August. Deputy Prime Minister Dmitry Patrushev, in an interview with Izvestia, projects that grain exports for this season will reach between 53 and 55 million tons, consistent with the five-year average.
